Package chess

Class Board

java.lang.Object
chess.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
This class creates a chess board and determines check's and checkmates on the board as well as making the moves if valid
Version:
1.0
Author:
nj243, rp930

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Piece[][] board  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    Constructor to create and initialize a chess board
    Board​(Piece[][] board)
    Constructor with parameter used to create a board given a board

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkForCheck​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
    checks to see if your team becomes in check by doing a move returns true if the move puts your own team in check(so cannot do the move) false if it does not put you in check, so you can do the move
    boolean checkmate​(boolean team)
    checks to see if the king can move into a spot where its not in check or a piece of the team can take the attacking piece or a piece could move in the way of the attacking piece
    boolean isOccupied​(int x, int y)
    Returns if a coordinate of the board is occupied by a piece object
    boolean makeMove​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
    makes sure it can do a castling move if needed and checks if other team is in check(mate) returns true if the move can be made, false if it cannot
    boolean otherTeamInCheck​(int x2, int y2)
    check if the move is made, if the move puts the other team in check returns true if it does put the other team in check, false if it does not
    void printBoard()
    Prints board
    boolean promotion​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, java.lang.String piece)
    if a pawn reaches the end of the board on either side (for its respective team) it changes the pawn into a promotion piece (queen if no input is given, otherwise the specific piece asked for) returns false, if that move cannot be made, true if it can be
    boolean returnColor​(int x, int y)
    Returns the team of a piece given the coordinates

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied​(int x, int y)
      Returns if a coordinate of the board is occupied by a piece object
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate of piece
      y - coordinate of piece
      Returns:
      boolean

    • returnColor

      public boolean returnColor​(int x, int y)
      Returns the team of a piece given the coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate of piece
      y - coordinate of piece
      Returns:
      boolean

    • promotion

      public boolean promotion​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, java.lang.String piece)
      if a pawn reaches the end of the board on either side (for its respective team) it changes the pawn into a promotion piece (queen if no input is given, otherwise the specific piece asked for) returns false, if that move cannot be made, true if it can be
      Parameters:
      x1 - first x-coordinate
      y1 - first y-coordinate
      x2 - second x-coordinate
      y2 - second y-coordinate
      piece - which piece
      Returns:
      boolean

    • makeMove

      public boolean makeMove​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      makes sure it can do a castling move if needed and checks if other team is in check(mate) returns true if the move can be made, false if it cannot
      Parameters:
      x1 - first x-coordinate
      y1 - first y-coordinate
      x2 - second x-coordinate
      y2 - second y-coordinate
      Returns:
      boolean

    • checkForCheck

      public boolean checkForCheck​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      checks to see if your team becomes in check by doing a move returns true if the move puts your own team in check(so cannot do the move) false if it does not put you in check, so you can do the move
      Parameters:
      x1 - first x-coordinate
      y1 - first y-coordinate
      x2 - second x-coordinate
      y2 - second y-coordinate
      Returns:
      boolean

    • checkmate

      public boolean checkmate​(boolean team)
      checks to see if the king can move into a spot where its not in check or a piece of the team can take the attacking piece or a piece could move in the way of the attacking piece
      Parameters:
      team - what team
      Returns:
      boolean

    • otherTeamInCheck

      public boolean otherTeamInCheck​(int x2, int y2)
      check if the move is made, if the move puts the other team in check returns true if it does put the other team in check, false if it does not
      Parameters:
      x2 - second x-coordinate
      y2 - second y-coordinate
      Returns:
      boolean

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints board
